code: import Fact from"../classes/Fact";const defaultFact=new Fact({date:new Date(),info:"Description",img:"https://picsum.photos/200.jpg"});function factReducer(state,action){let obj=action.payload;let newState=null;switch(action.type){case"set":newState=new Fact({...state,...obj});break;case"reset":newState=defaultFact;break;default:newState=state;};return newState;}export{factReducer,defaultFact};
